message.body: bladesofsorrow: you talk like a spoilt child. networks like zeronet, Tor, i2p, Freenet & others are not an amusement park, they endeavor to provide the technical infrastructure to enable netizens to have a online voice/presence & the freedom to express themselves when to do so in their own country will get them totured/dead/imprisoned/imprisoned indefintely & totured/disappeared. If you miss the 'excitement' then run back to the clear net & it will welcome you with open arms :)

so many people visit zeronet/Tor/i2p/freenet etc already brainwashed with childish expectations of what they think they should be able to find here. "Show me the guns" "Show me the drugs" "Show me something I can't find on the clear net." "Entertain me with links to abnormal human behaviour", etc

Social conditioning by the media & politicians etc is designed to make censorship resistant networks appear to be only for the purposes of illegal activities. Meanwhile, the right to freedom of speech is being crushed & now also in many European countries too! However, the rapid momentum to crush freedom of speech & also freedom of movement is equally present in the meat space.

It must be understood that in many countries in Europe & beyond, we're entering the last days of freedom of movement & freedom of protest in the meat space, with the proliferation of military hardware & mass surveillance technology that will be utilised by police forces internationally. The surveillance grid will be excelerated by the advent of 5G & AI-Based computer systems & surveillance drones with vastly improved camera technology & this will almost completely end free movement & therefore free mass protest within the next 5-10 years.

When free movement & mass street protests have been shut-down by the technolgy-led police forces of Europe & beyond the only available option for protest of any length of time will be Internet-based protest. Zeronet, i2p, Tor & Freenet & possibly other networks will be available for the people to gather to safely & securely share our thoughts & feelings & strategies for Internet-based protest in all it's myriad forms.

At the present time many people are waking up to the reality that they would prefer to have a safe place to meet & socialise online that doesn't expose them to corporate data-rape & the wholesale collection of their meta-data et al to be scrutinzed at a later date by the emerging AI technologies. Those peoples are also very welcome in this place.

It's feasible history will show that the development of cenosrship resistant internet networks in the early 21 century laid the crucial foundations for the subsequent Internet-based resistance to the theft of our indvivdual liberties & sovereignty as individual citizens & entire nations.

Rather than visiting networks like zeronet & making statements like it's 'boring' or 'sucks' try instead to educate yourself to understand that many of these networks are *still in developement* & even Tor/i2p/Freenet are also *still in development* 15 years +

Instead: educate yourself on why these networks have become necessary, how you could contribute in some way to help the networks evolve & grow. Time will tell the precious & critical role censorship resistant networks will play in the facilitating free (indpendent) speech & action as the 21 century progresses.
May The F0rce be with You
